item.title: CVE-2024-25934|2024-03-15T12:57:59.723Z -- FormFacade -- FormFacade
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FormFacade allows Stored XSS.This issue affects FormFacade: from n/a through 1.0.0.
